name: Camera Upgrades
description: An overhaul to both cameras by changing and deleting some properties. Default enabled options are recommended.

options.name: I agree!
options.tooltip: Options in each 'group' can be either for the regular camera or the suspect camera. So read carefully too before you select an option and check the description for possible issues when picking one. Input options are based on DEFAULT KEYBINDS. Checking this box does nothing but confirm you've fully read what's been written here

options.name: I failed to understand
options.tooltip: Uninstall the mod and re-install the mod. After that don't touch any options unless you know what they do. Checking this box does nothing but confirm you've fully read what's been written here

options.name: Fix - Stay low!
options.tooltip: Stops 47 from standing up everytime you want to take a picture with the suspect camera and gives you the ability to crouch and stand up as well. Note: Crouch button is the same as prime tag button so you might want to enable the 'Switch Prime set button' option in combination

options.name: Fix - Zoom slider on top
options.tooltip: Swaps the positions of the selfie mode button and zoom camera slider for the normal camera in the photomode menu. Requires Selfie Mode Mod by Anthony Fuller

options.name: Fix - Proper flash in picture mode
options.tooltip: Stops the flash fading away completely so you can see pictures in the dark better (example; club in Berlin)

options.name: Functions - Instinct in Normal Camera
options.tooltip: Gives instinct in normal Camera like the Suspect Camera does

options.name: Functions - Disable Proximity based tagging
options.tooltip: [Recommended] Completely removes the distance filter for suspect tagging so you can tag suspects from anywhere. Credits to Notex

options.name: Functions - Disable Proximity based intel scanning
options.tooltip: Completely removes the distance filter for intel scanning so you can scan the intel to unlock the safe from any distance. Note: The visual effect can get buggy with multiple intel in sight but you can also scan multiple intel at the same time

options.name: Functions - Reset Zoom on Exit
options.tooltip: Resets the zoom slider to 1x whenever exiting the normal camera. Basically made as an add-on for Atampy 26's Enhanced Camera Zoom mod because the normal camera lacks this function by default.

options.name: Functions - Disable Suspect Reset Zoom
options.tooltip: [Not Recommended] Retains and keeps your zoom amount when exiting and entering aiming mode with the suspect camera.

options.name: Input - Scroll to Zoom
options.tooltip: Enables the use of the mouse scroll to zoom. For mouse and keyboard players. Current solution swaps the up/down and left/right controls for the camera controls. 'Z/W' and 'X' will be used for navigating up and down the photomenu depending on your keyboard layout and default keybinds (Azert/Qwerty/Chinese/....).

options.name: Editing - Suspect camera filters
options.tooltip: Gives you the filter options from the normal camera

options.name: Editing - Suspect camera DOF
options.tooltip: Gives you the Depth of Field slider from the normal camera

options.name: Editing - Remove normal camera filters
options.tooltip: Removes the filter options from the normal camera

options.name: Editing - Remove normal camera DOF
options.tooltip: Removes the Depth of Field slider from the normal camera

options.name: UI - Disable cripple camera Hud
options.tooltip: [Recommended] Disables the comically large USE CAMERA button when holding (not aiming) any camera. Credits to -invalid-

options.name: UI - Clutter off
options.tooltip: Toggle the UI menu for either camera off anytime

options.name: UI - Clear The Grid
options.tooltip: Removes the gridlines from the spycam for better visibility

options.name: UI - Self Cleaning UI
options.tooltip: Dynamically removes functions you can't adjust in certain photomode scenarios like zoom or DOF. [Built in by default with any suspect camera editing options]

options.name: About Input options
options.tooltip: Pick the same Input type from each group to prevent double inputs for the same functions. It's recommended but not necessary to enable both groups. Checking this box does nothing but confirm you've fully read what's been written here

options.name: Offㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
options.tooltip: Keeps the default button the game has set which is crouch, default as 'C'

options.name: Input type 1 - Switch to A/Q button
options.tooltip: Switches the Prime set suspect button from crouch to melee so you can crouch without accidently tagging suspects as prime. The melee button is A or Q (the key left of your 'walk forward' key) by default depending on your keyboard layout (Azert/Qwerty)
options.image: content/pics/from C to A or Q.png

options.name: Input type 2 - Switch to E button
options.tooltip: Switches the Prime set suspect button from crouch to 'use' button instead. The use button is by default 'E' (the key right of your 'walk forward' key) depending on your keyboard layout (Azert/Qwerty)

options.name: Offㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ
options.tooltip: Keeps the default buttons the game has set which are A for the normal camera and E for the suspect camera

options.name: Input type 1 - normal camera to 'E'
options.tooltip: Will make the hide menu button for the normal camera the same as the suspect camera which is E.

options.name: Input type 2 - Suspect camera to 'A'
options.tooltip: Will make the toggle viewfinder button for the suspect camera the same as the normal camera which is A/Q instead.

options.name: Doesn't touch any zoom options
options.tooltip: The suspect camera stays untouched and broken as it was

options.name: Increment steps zoom fix
options.tooltip: The Suspect camera currently zooms from 1x to 4x directly. This option makes it zoom in increments of 1 while keeping the vanilla 4x maximum zoom

options.name: 10x zoom with 1x increment steps
options.tooltip: [Recommended] Based of Atampy26's enhanced zoom mod, the suspect camera now also can zoom up to 10x. Comes standard in zoom increments of 1

options.name: 10x zoom but in 2x
options.tooltip: [Kind of broken] Gives suspect camera 10x zoom but in increments of 2. This means 2x, 4x, 6x etc.
